Name: Apple Strudel (by Alex Kammerling)
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Carefully FLOAT cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.
Review: This sweet dessert cocktail tastes just like mum's home-made apple pie with cream.
History: Created in 1999 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Strudel (by Alex Kammerling) contains 263 calories
